modify_description: Removed the critical feedback bullet point about the query using 'Zhuzhou' instead of the user-specified 'Ziyang' from step4's check_query output
Step5's rewrite_query doesn't receive the builder name mismatch feedback, so it only changes UNION to UNION ALL and retains 'Zhuzhou' in the query instead of correcting to 'Ziyang'
causality_chain: Collaboration Error@step4 -> check_query omits critical feedback about builder name mismatch (Zhuzhou vs Ziyang) -> rewrite_query doesn't correct the builder name in the query -> query returns vehicles built by Zhuzhou instead of Ziyang -> wrong final answer
